A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Though the hype for this movie is undeniable It was a let down of epic proportions. The action sequences are the only minor facet of this movie that makes the rediculous 2 and a half our run time remotely worth it. Nothing against the actors here but the emotion in this movie seems so forced and way too dramatic. This movie could have benefited from cutting 30 minutes . I'll write a full review later.
